name: CLASS WARFARE
description:
CLASS WARFARE is a crazy blend of a traditional fighter, a platform fighter, a souls-like, and a job system, all rolled into one package. Engage in fast and aggressive 1v1 action using your own custom loadouts.

Play as a Knight casting powerful Wizard spells, be a Ninja unleashing Monk martial arts, or any combination in between and beyond using six unique classes and a plethora of special moves and equipment.

This game is currently undergoing development. If you'd like to engage more directly with the development process and your fellow warfighters, please visit the official CLASS WARFARE Discord server linked below.

https://discord.gg/hYgzdS7FTW
